title: LIVE FACT-CHECK! Biden's First Address Before the Joint Session of Congress | Louder with Crowder
description:
PROMO CODE: FLAG
$20 off MugClub

Steven Crowder will be LIVE and fact-checking Joe Biden’s address to a joint session of Congress so that you don't have to! Of course, with the infamous Crowder drinking game as well. How many lies will Biden tell? How many masks will he be wearing? Tune in to find out!
